entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Clean up AOT Publishing #72415
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Numerics #72410
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System #72409
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.CompilerServices #72408
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Collections #72407
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.IO #72406
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Reflection #72405
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Diagnostics #72404
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #72403
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Intrinsics #72402
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Security #72401
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices #72400
    7.0.0
  • SslStress fails to build on Linux #72399
  • Improve build error when python isn't installed #72395
  • JsonConverter<IPAddress> fails to work #72393
  • [API Proposal]: make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72389
  • Make call-counting, class probes, block counters cache-friendly #72387
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Random failure on perf pipeline: `SecurityException: Invalid assembly public key.` #72385
  • [API Proposal]: Hide CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute Parameters in Intellisense #72382
  • Add APIs to make operator ! to implement conjugate operation of Complex struct #72380
  • system.composition.typedparts.tests work item #72378
  • Disabling test on Linux Bionic is not effective with `PlatformSpecific` #72369
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Improve AuthenticationException error message #72368
    7.0.0
  • [linux-arm64] Random and rare runtime crash System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException (System.Net.Sockets) #72365
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests failure on win-arm64 with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #72364
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] NRE in System.Collections.Immutable.Tests.ImmutableArrayBuilderTest.IndexOf #72363
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Different from "DataTableExtensions.AsDataView", add a static version "DataTableExtensions.AsStaticDataView" #72358
  • Type initializer call ordering w.r.t. static field stores does not look right #72354
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure readytorun\\tests\\fileversionpreservation\\fileversionpreservation\\fileversionpreservation.cmd #71919
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<Int32> #69732
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Random #69559
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #67372
    Future
  • [Android][libraries] Test suites failing with A JSON parsing exception #53097
    7.0.0
  • Finalize decision on RegexOptions.IgnoreCase case-equivalence function #69039
    7.0.0
  • system.threading.thread.tests work item #72352
  • System.Reflection.Metadata throws OOM on corrupt custom attribute value (mega array) #57531
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests][eat] Trimming errors related to custom attributes #51211
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #64622
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] QuicConnection API follow up #72027
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/2 stress tests failing massively #72015
    7.0.0
  • baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #65201
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/diagnosticport/diagnosticport/diagnosticport.sh #61488
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #63325
    7.0.0
  • Croatian CultureInfo is not resolving parent culture info #52388
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly debugger jumps into JS code mono CLR while debugging C# only code #55214
    7.0.0
  • Missing package libldap-2.4.so.2 at runtime:5.0-buster-slim #68365
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOS] Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical PhysicalFileProviderTests failure #58584
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/shift/int64_r/int64_r.sh #71920
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in integer parsing #70376
  • signal SIGSEGV: invalid address (fault address: 0x8b8) at gc.cpp:44891:33 #67008
    6.0.x
  • [Mobile] SSL certificate hostname not verified when targeting local WebAPI #70434
  • [tvOS] System.ExecutionEngineException : Attempting to JIT compile method while running in aot-only mode. #59855
  • net7.0-iOSSimulator-Release-x64-Mono_Release-OSX.1015.Amd64.Open timeout failure #72292
  • Regressions in System.Formats.Tar.Tests.Perf_TarFile #70366
  • Official build sometimes fails building mono.workloads #67117
  • What should the default DistributedContextPropagator be #56794
    Future
  • Pressing CTRL+C while polling for user input disables input echoing. #71154
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    7.0.0
  • [Question] CoreCLR debug API usage, evaluation after `ICorDebugController::Stop`. #72190
  • QUIC: Allocate MsQuicSafeHandle._traceId lazily #71935
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Add tests - HttpVersionPolicy.RequestVersionOrHigher does not work #46797
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows #69978
    Future
  • IMemoryCache is expiring unexpectedly in a nested use case #72345
  • QUIC: ApplicationProtocol in ConnectionOptionsCallback not used #72361
  • Image.FromStream is an order of magnitude slower on Linux (compared to Windows) #31268
    Future
  • [wasm][aot] Runtime crash in `System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests` #54194
    7.0.0
  • `IsMultiRegNode` on ARM assumes all `BITCAST`s are multi-reg #71831
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor WASM] CultureInfo.DisplayName not consistent #55348
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Public PGO config switch #70410
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary call to Path.GetTempPath #72414
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Scan calli dependencies #72413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Modify workload to pick threading runtime packs #72412
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf XML comments #72411
  • Fix typo #72398
    area-System.Threading
  • Ensure reflection-based metadata instantiations unwrap TargetInvocationException. #72397
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Limit core-count of fankkuch benchmark code #72396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean up of tests from V1/V2 marshaller shape split #72392
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [QUIC] Listener AcceptConnectionAsync propagates errors from failed handshake #72390
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Expand API documentation of contract customization APIs. #72388
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Bump simulator test queues to use MacOS 12 #72384
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • [mono][aot] Fix the adding of generic instances referenced by gshared… #72377
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Avoid using type info from GDV guesses during import #72376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] add new interop to the console template #72375
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3 Improved message for failing QUIC connection #72374
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove wrong cgroups assert #72372
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use TlsAlertMessage enum to make exception messages more readable #72370
    area-System.Net
  • Fixes overwrite of last captured managed stack frame address in EvenPipe stack trace. #72362
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Support guaranteed unmarshal for stateless collection marshalling #72205
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Enable CopyConstructorMarshaler test after #71792 fix #72383
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix error handling for COM initialization failures during thread startup #72353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][tests][eat] Enabling tests related to custom attributes. #72359
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection-mono, trimming-for-aot
  • [wasm] Remove npm audit call in CI since internal npm doesn't support it and the official registry is blocked #72386
    area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] API changes follow up #72366
    area-System.Net
  • Utilize ProtocolException for HTTP/2 in HttpStress #72034
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Fix failing CI test, and misc fixes #72293
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix incorrect none_no value when NUMA node is undefined in distribute_other_procs #69082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui runs for net7.0 #71979
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary cast for num elements expression #72302
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Rebaseline llvm-libunwind tree #72351
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move interop project refs to common place #72367
    area-Build-mono
  • Allocate MsQuicSafeHandle._traceId lazily #72360
    area-System.Net
  • [HTTP/3] Add tests - HttpVersionPolicy.RequestVersionOrHigher #72357
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Support OpenSSL-based MsQuic on Windows #72262
    area-System.Net
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1887058 #72303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disabling Linux Bionic tests that fail on staging - #72256 follow up. #72355
    area-System.IO, test-bug
  • Do not consider single-reg bitcasts multi-reg nodes #72020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generate fewer type loader templates #72350
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve reliability of some SafeHandle creations #72341
    area-System.Security
  • Delete unused field #72318
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Native AOT runtime changes for multiple package conflict #72346
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double (and Float) to Decimal Conversion Precision Improvement #72217
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add analyzer for validating NativeMarshallingAttribute and parameters of CustomMarshallerAttribute #72299
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add `perf-wasm` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Make `Enum.GetValues` AOT-safe #72236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add X509 SAN extension and RFC6125 MatchesHostname #72304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Working Windows image for HttpStress and SslStress #72271
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Consolidate importer spilling code #72291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification, Future
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #72097
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Do not assume return type ABIs match in `RETURN(CALL)` #72285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Use correct runtime assembly in MetadataReader tests #72211
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement the ContentLengthReadStream.Length property #71879
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Fix incorrect buffer reallocation in AcceptSecurityContext #72339
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch does not work in eng\dogfood.cmd environment #26668
  • Unused StringWriter in GenerateToolsSettingsFile #26664

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ownership of dotnet watch #26669
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Switch to hosted images to try to avoid the 45 minute timeout #26621
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude VS references from source build (#26556) #26670
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove unnecessary fields on FirstPartyNuGetPackageSigningVerifier #26623
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1888683 #26571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26500
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • specification of the `foreach` statement (12.9.5) doesn't apply for `System.Span` #6289

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "Support extension methods everywhere" #301
    Likely Never

PullRequests

Merged

  • Spec forbidding constant numeric patterns on `INumberBase<T>` #6273

Updated

  • ref fields updates #6285
  • Add lambda/method group defaults proposal #6274

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #62758
  • Confusing error message assigning `in` parameter reference to `ref` field #62756
  • Use LocalClientSettingsStorageLocation to store TodoCommentOptions #62754
    17.4
  • Migrate options stored in local registry to roaming options, where it makes sense #62748
    Backlog
  • use of `ReadOnlySpan` inside `foreach` #62747
  • Find All References doesn't find all references of a type parameter in a generic method. #62744
  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider encountered error and has been disabled - VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 3.0 #62739
    17.4
  • Feature 'Missing import discovery' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #62737
  • Change the `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` constructor signature to take a single value. #62734
    17.4
  • `IsKnownIDEDiagnosticId` implementation doesn't look correct #62733
    Backlog
  • `AbstractRemoveUnusedParametersAndValuesDiagnosticAnalyzer` has 'unnecessary' descriptors but doesn't derive unnecessary analyzer base class #62731
    Backlog
  • Incorrectly reported implicit conversion #62728
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727

Closed

  • VS does not show me the function declaration (arguments) when it hits an error #62742
  • CS0121 for extension methods with and without ref modifier #62729
  • New rename UI shouldn't show "Include overload(s)" for locals/params/properties/fields #62267
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix GetNext/PreviousDirective's handling of duplicate trivia #62760
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify find refs helpers #62755
    Area-IDE
  • All text editor options are roaming #62753
    Area-IDE
  • Find references to type-parameters used in object-creation expressions. #62752
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Delete obsolete internal options #62746
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Use actual equivalence keys, not loc strings to distinguish helpers #62740
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62736
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix PR Validation pipeline #62757
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Update SymReader to the latest version (#62695)" #62743
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert #62684 and #62695 to resolve infra issues #62745
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62751
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow diagnostic tagging to use either push or pull diagnostics #62738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer - take 2 #62617
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pass LineFormatting options into OmniSharpCodeAction options #62712
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62726
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62725
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow symbol keys to resolve against error symbols. #62681
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62722
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62721
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix new rename showing overloads when not applicable #62559
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE
  • Move our C# syntax generator over to be an IIncrementalGenerator #62682
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • windows build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support running endpoints filters in MVC #42799
    7.0-rc1
  • user-jwts prints error message on `path1` #42794
  • Custom naming when binding nested objects as properties of a model #42790
  • Performance optimizations for streams now that the WebTransport PR introduced new stream types #42789
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebTransport PR follow-ups #42788
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Adjusting the default Kestrel development certificate to support WebTransport #42787
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Adding more tests to WebTransport #42786
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Implementing WebTransport over HTTP/2 #42785
    Backlog
  • Adding datagrams support to WebTransport #42784
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Connection disconnected with error 'Error: Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message from the server.'. #42778
  • Disable Tracing in production #42776
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing failed to build with error MSB4186 #42772

Closed

  • InternalVisibleTo for not supported extension #42317
  • HTTP/3: Support client certificates on non-Windows platforms #35800
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel: No error logged if the user does not have access to certificate private key #42643
  • Automatically generate OpenAPI security schemas for bearer-based auth #42234
  • Web API call succeeds but returns 0 bytes for large response objects #42726
  • [Question] Implementation of IOQueue's Execute #42735
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool inconsistent versioning #42773
  • Improve Default Blazor WASM Loading Experience #37199
    7.0-preview7
  • dotnet 6 angular template does not work out of the box #42632
  • Blazor component lifecycle and state management. #42758
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection PersistKeysToDbContext - CreateNewKey fails with exception #42769

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused namespace from webapi template #42798
    area-mvc
  • Clean up localization files #42797
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42793
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42792
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Move builds to MacOS 11 #42791
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Enable client cert tests on non-Windows OSes #42783
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Update DefaultChunkSize comment in ChunkingCookieManager #42777
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration (#42679) #42771
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4556086` to `bea621c` #42782
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Correct a typo in the code comment #42753
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView and VerticalStackLayout do not resize themselves on iOS #8820
  • If the user hasn't specified a VSM then look at ways to only apply color changes to the "normal" state of a control #8819
    .NET 7
  • Issue with AndExpandLayoutManager in converted application #8816
  • Why Error compiling Android/Windows (Release) Debug Model Compiling NoError #8815
  • CarouselView inside of one of DataTemplates in DataTemplateSelector results in random DataTemplates in Windows #8811
  • ImageSource FromFile Android internal bug? #8809
  • Frame inside CollectionView unable to be selected in Android #8805
  • DataTemplateSelector in CollectionView does not size/measure items properly #8803
  • UI Automation hit testing on CollectionView items hangs Maui app #8801
  • Auto Update MAUI App #8800
  • Can't find global resource dictionary #8799
  • What is an analog of NamedSize for MAUI fonts? #8798
  • Path Shadow Not Working Consistently on Windows #8796
    6.0-servicing
  • SelectionChangedCommand from CollectionView doesn't work #8792

Closed

  • ILogger.LogDebug does not output anything #8818
  • support linux and Android #8802
  • Not able to rollback to specific maui workload version (6.0.312) #8758
  • [Android] Runtime update of IsVisible Property is not working #8804
  • In Blazor webview after viewing image I can't delete it #8776
  • [Android] Canvas shadow didn't get applied for the drawn ellipse #8807
  • Why Error compiling Android/Windows (Release) Debug Mode Compiling NoError #8814
  • ToolbarItem doesn't trigger Command #8795

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22368.2 #8822
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Avoid to create the Shadow bitmap if is not neccesary (memory consumption) #8817
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [build] make sure toolbox images are embedded #8806
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen for Net6 #8797
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr3
  • MAUI to 6.0.400 #7862
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] remove ColorStateList(int[][],int[]) usage #5654
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • Older net6 workloads don't support full unpackaged #8813
  • [Tizen] Add the missing patches to net6.0 branch #8791
    platform/tizen, 6.0-sr4

Updated

  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514

  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316

  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    area/controls 🎮
